sentences.sContent: Automatic logoff feature helps alleviate such risks by automatically disabling the session using recommended time-out values for dormancy.
sentences.sContent_eng: Automatic logoff feature helps alleviate such risks by automatically disabling the session using recommended time-out values for dormancy.
sentences.sCn: 自动下线特性通过对休眠使用推荐的超时值，可以帮助降低此类风险。

sentences.sContent: All nine were put in dimensional locks, essentially powered down into energetic dormancy through the technology of the Alliance. Many other magnificent Temple Crystals were lost.
sentences.sContent_eng: All nine were put in dimensional locks, essentially powered down into energetic dormancy through the technology of the Alliance. Many other magnificent Temple Crystals were lost.
sentences.sCn: 这 九个水晶都放置着维度锁，基本上经由(外星)联盟的技术将其能量降至休眠的状态 。

sentences.sContent: After a 20-year period of dormancy, the volcanobegan to erupt once more.
sentences.sContent_eng: After a 20-year period of dormancy, the volcanobegan to erupt once more.
sentences.sCn: 在20年的休眠后，这座火山又再一次肆虐。

remMethod.val: dorm(睡眠) + ancy → 休眠； 催眠状态

words.tran: 休眠的；静止的；睡眠状态的；隐匿的
